author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Collector and District Election Officer Sajjansingh R. Chavan released the names and contact numbers of Returning Officers and Assistant Returning Officers for the six Assembly constituencies in Kanyakumari district on Wednesday.

According to a press release issue dhere on Wednesday , the Constituencies, ROs, AROs and their contact numbers are:

Kanyakumari : Returning Officer D. Chinnammal, District Supply Officer – 94450 00391 and AROs S. Chokkalingam Pillai, PA to DSO – 94431 25370 and L. Muthulakshmi, Tahsildhar, Thovalai – 94450 00688;

Nagercoil : S. Madhiyazhagan, RDO – 94450 00482, AROs K. Kannan, PA to RDO – 94424 63689 and A.V. Murthy, Tahsildhar, Agasteeswaram – 94450 00689

Colachel : R. Sivadoss, District Adi Dravidar Welfare Officer – 94436 47321, AROs C. Raja, Special Tahsildhar, ADDWO – 94421 61988 and A. Raja Singh, Special Tahsildar (SSS), Kalkulam – 97871 74555

Padmanabhapuram : Shreya P. Singh, Sub-Collector – 94450 00483,AROs L. Rajasekaran, PA to Sub-Collector 94892 83063 and Y. Kumaradoss, Tahsildar, Kalkulam – 94450 00690

Vilavancode : P.V. Saravanan, District Backward Class and Minorities Welfare Officer, 94454 77848, AROs B. Sheela, Tashildar, Vilavancode – 94450 00691 and K. P. Joy Saroja, Special Tahsildar (SSS) Vilavancode – 96980 228728

Killiyoor: A. Kalimuthu, Assistant Commissioner (Excise) – 94450 74582, AROs V. Josephine Felsita Vasuki, Hozur Sirasthar, Excise – 94428 36608 and B. Suresh Kumar, Divisional Excise Officer, Padmanabhapuram – 94869 34383.
title: ROs, AROs for six Assembly segments in Kanyakumari
